backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and per‑user investment portfolios with authentication and CRUD operations for investments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented frontend features to source files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all major frontend files used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and theme variable definitions configuring light/dark color palettes and layout base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, layout, authentication gating, profile setup, and page mounting for the React frontend.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog for destructive actions with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/InvestmentForm.t: Form dialog for creating and editing investments with validation, type selection, and integration with backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for entering and saving a user's name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar with authenticated/unauthenticated links, account dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Computes totals and per‑type investment summaries from the investment list.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context providing Internet Identity login, logout, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and investment records via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark theme variables with finance‑styled color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Displays a dashboard with investment summaries, loading state, and prompts to add investments when empty.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero and feature sections promoting portfolio management and navigation to login or dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Investment.tsx: Lists and manages investments with add, edit, delete actions and includes a form and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Handles Internet Identity authentication, showing login or account details and navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Defines project state, required images, and a list of existing frontend and feature requirements for a portfolio and investment tracking app. Includes metadata such as schema version, project version, and feature descriptions.
